answers.answer: Hsv2 orally doesn't reoccur very often and doesn't shed from there very often. It's not likely to be an issue.graceps it's most helpful to us if you just keep adding to your original thread - less confusing that way :)

question: I have had HSV2 for only about two months. I have it in the genital area but also tested positive at the first outbreak for its presence in my throat. I was told by an epidemiologist through my nurse that this site is not viable for  HSV2 and that it will not remain latent there; but I am wondering how true that is.I dread the thought of having just transmitted HSV2 to my HSV-free/Type 1 Diabetes partner by fellacio. I was on twice-daily Valtrex, and sensed no symptoms in my throat area.Much Stress and Fear,Helia
title: Fellacio and Herpes Transmission
